quote: No experience is a cause of success or failure. We do not suffer from the shock of our experiences, so-called trauma - but we make out of them just what suits our purposes. – Alfred Adler
fact: The value of Pi will be officially "rounded down" to 3.14 from 3.14159265359 on December 31, 1999.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What lies at the bottom of the ocean and twitches? A nervous wreck.
